not sure where to put this.

any ways id like to know if theres away to find out if the build is unbalanced? or is there a Mod out there thats can help?

it seems i always have some part of my builds unbalanced even thou it the same all around my builds.

You can toggle to view center of mass, center of lift and center of thrust in the VAB & SPH. They should help you balance your craft, sometimes even the smallest alteration can change the flight characteristics of your craft.
RCS Build Aid is very helpful for this.
